description: Vector of atomic values, stored in a (possibly compressed) text file in the [standard CSV format](https://github.com/ArtifactDB/comservatory). If the vector is unnamed, the file should have a single column containing the vector elements. If the vector is named, the fil should contain two columns; the first (string) column contains the names of the vector elements and the second column contains the vector elements themselves. In both cases, the headers are ignored.

compression.description: Type of compression applied to the file.

type.description:
Type of the column.

- Integers, (floating-point) numbers, strings and booleans are their usual selves.
- Dates are strings consisting of integers and dashes, following the `YYYY-MM-DD` format.
- Date-times are strings following RFC 3339 Section 5.6, i.e., the Internet Date/Time format.

is_child.description: Is this a child document, only to be interpreted in the context of the parent document from which it is linked? This may have implications for search and metadata requirements.

path.description: Path to the file in the project directory.

title: Atomic vector
